= Introduction =

Ubuntu:

An installation guide.

= Details =
*Installing SCons 1.2.0:*

    wget http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/scons/scons-1.2.0.tar.gz <br>
    tar xvfz scons-1.2.0.tar.gz <br>
    cd scons-1.2.0 <br>
    sudo python setup.py install <br>

*Installing SWiG 1.2.0:*

    wget http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/swig/swig-1.3.39.tar.gz <br>
    tar xvfz swig-1.3.39.tar.gz <br>
    cd swig-1.3.39 <br>
    ./configure <br>
    make <br>
    sudo make install <br>

*Installing lua 5.1:*

    wget http://www.lua.org/ftp/lua-5.1.X.tar.gz <br>
    tar xvfz lua-5.1.X.tar.gz <br>
    cd lua-5.1.X/ <br>
    make macosx <br>
    sudo make install <br>

*Installing glfw 2.6:*

    wget http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/glfw/glfw-2.6.tar.bz2 <br>
    tar xvfj glfw-2.6.tar.bz2 <br>
    cd glfw/ <br>
    chmod +x compile.sh <br>
    ./compile.sh <br>
    make macosx-gcc <br>

*Installing FreeImage 3.12.0:*

    wget http://downloads.sourceforge.net/freeimage/FreeImage3120.zip <br>
    unzip FreeImage3120.zip <br>
    cd FreeImage <br>
    make -f Makefile.osx <br>
    sudo make install <br>

*Installing fftw 3.2:*

    wget http://www.fftw.org/fftw-3.2.1.tar.gz <br>
    tar xvfz fftw-3.2.1.tar.gz <br>
    cd fftw-3.2.1/ <br>
    ./configure <br>
    make <br>
    sudo make install <br>

*Installing FMOD 3.75:*

    wget http://www.fmod.org/index.php/release/version/fmodapi375mac.zip <br>
    unzip fmodapi375mac.zip <br>
    cd fmodapi375mac <br>
    sudo cp api/inc/`*` /usr/local/include/ <br>
    sudo cp api/lib/`*` /usr/local/lib/ <br>
